name: THE LOST ISLAND (itch) (Kshitij Srivastava)
description: Explore the abandoned island of Kalahar as Lymen, our protagonist, in search of a legendary treasure. As you wander the deserted landscape, unravel the mysteries of the island and discover its hidden secrets. Experience a captivating and immersive story as you uncover the truth behind the island's past inhabitants. With beautiful graphics and a haunting soundtrack, this walking simulator will keep you on the edge of your seat as you unravel the mysteries of Kalahar.
